summary: TAPI OK brand website with permanent #D32F2F red and white theme
architectural_notes: Header color fixed to #D32F2F regardless of theme changes
Official brand color: #D32F2F (red) with white accents
Brand logo features TAPI OK text with orange/yellow fruit element and green leaf

existing_features.title: Replace the current TAPI OK logo in the header with the uploaded brand logo image (ChatGPT Image Feb 23, 2026, 12_00_04 PM (1)-1.png). The logo must be displayed exactly as provided without modifications.
Set the header background color to #D32F2F (red) as a permanent, fixed color that never changes when the theme switches between light and dark mode.
Update the website theme to use #D32F2F (red) as the official brand color throughout the application. Replace existing brand color variables and update UI elements that use the primary brand color.
Remove the current purple chip image from the home page and replace it with the uploaded TAPI OK brand logo image (ChatGPT Image Feb 23, 2026, 12_00_04 PM (1)-1.png).
